p: Herbal products (spices, essential oils, and extracts) have been used as a source of functional flavoring agents (Azizkhani & Parsaeimehr, 2018), bioactive antioxidants, and other compounds, such as phenolic compounds, and can be incorporated as nontraditional additives in fermented milk products, including yogurt (Mahmoudi et al., 2016). There are several studies about the health benefits of herbs, including antimicrobial, antioxidant, anti‐inflammatory, and anticarcinogenic properties (Azizkhani & Parsaeimehr, 2018).
